actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that illegitimate children of old age insurance beneficiaries may become entitled to child's insurance benefits in certain additional cases.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that illegitimate children of old-age insurance beneficiaries under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) may become entitled to child's insurance benefits in specified cases.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that illegitimate children of old age insurance beneficiaries may become entitled to child's insurance benefits in certain additional cases.
